intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Hands Space Marine chapter or any of its successor chapters. The Iron Hands are notable for their heavy use of bionics and their reverence for all things mechanical, and thus their close ties to the Adeptus Mechanicus.
strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Iron Hands detachments and aircraft formations.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Iron Hands, or one of their successor chapters, using their preferred operational methods.

formations.name: Dreadnought Clan
formations.units: One Iron Hands Captain or Techmarine, four Tacticals plus transport, and any two of the following: Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought, Siege Dreadnought

formations.name: Mechanized Clan
formations.units: One Iron Hands Captain or Techmarine, four Tacticals plus transport, and any two of the following: Predator Annihilator, Predator Destructor or Vindicator

sections.name: Iron Hands Support Detachments
sections.description: Two Support Detachments may be taken per Core Detachment

formations.name: Dreadnought Talon
formations.units: Any four of the following: Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought, Siege Dreadnought. Plus transport.

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Four Predator Destructors and/or Predator Annihilators

formations.name: Siege Scouts
formations.units: Four Scouts, two Siege Rhinos and two Vindicators

formations.name: Whirlwinds
extraUnits: Add one Whirlwind to the formation: 50 points

sections.name: Iron Hands Navy & Collegia Titanica Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhounds - Standard or Support Configuration
extraUnits: Upgrade both Warhounds to the Tank Hunter Configuration: 50 points

upgrades.title: Iron Hands Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

options.description: Add one Hunter to the formation
Add two Hunters to the formation
Add up to two Stalkers to the formation

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: Devastators
items.description: Replace all Tacticals in the formation with Iron Hands Devastators

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add any two of the following: Dreadnought, Hellfire Dreadnought or Siege Dreadnought

items.name: Ironclad Dreadnoughts
items.description: Replace up to two Dreadnoughts with Ironclad Dreadnoughts

items.name: Venerable Dreadnought
items.description: Add a Venerable Dreadnought character to a Dreadnought of any configuration

items.name: Helios
items.description: Upgrade any number of Land Raiders to Land Raider Helios

items.name: Supreme Commander (0-1 per army)
items.description: Replace an Iron Hands Captain with an Iron Hands Supreme Commander

items.name: Transports
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks or Land Raider variants, up to the number required to transport the formation

options.description: The formation may take Siege Rhinos instead of Rhinos
